p.span: you have moved into our school district and need to enroll your student for THIS school year {2019-2020} Will Rogers Elementary’s office hours are from 9:00am-10:00am.

span.span: We will begin distance learning on Monday, April 6. The Elementary has provided learning packets for Week One. The High School and Junior High will be handing out packets on Monday. There are several platforms that we will use to provide video instruction. They are Facebook Live, Google Meet/Hangout, See Saw, Google Classroom or Zoom. Teachers will be calling to let you know which platform will be used for your student and how to connect. These platforms work with smartphones or computers. We have also created a DISTANCE LEARNING TAB on our website (

) which you can click on to access our Parent Hub which contains numerous free websites that your children may use for “extra” learning practice. Toward the bottom of the hub, teachers have provided links for their classes and needed information. For those families that don’t have internet access, the teachers will have office hours, three-days per week, to handle questions. A chart for the video instruction start times and office hours will be included on our website. Elementary video instruction will start Week One. Video instruction for grades 7-12 will start Week Two. It is taking longer to schedule grades 7-12 because students have so many different teachers.

Grades 6-12 may pick up learning packets on Monday morning from 9:00 am to noon. Pick up will be drive-thru. We will hand you the packets through your car windows. Individual packets are labeled for each student. We ask everyone to enter through the south (HS) entrance. HS packets will be first, followed by junior high. Please be safe.

a.span: Click Here for Distance Learning Resources

span.span:
BREAKFAST AND LUNCH PICKUP:
BFDC Schools has received approval to serve free-of-charge meals to ANY child from 0-18 years old while school is closed. We will be serving breakfast and lunch in snack bags starting Monday, March 23rd using drive through service.

Pick up will occur at two sites, Will Rogers Elementary and the Dill City gym, from 10:30 to 11:30 am, Monday through Friday. Please remain in your vehicle. Sacks will be handed to you through your vehicle window.
All food has been prepared at the proper temperature. All food has been mainitained at the proper holding temperature. Food may need to be reheated before consuming.
Please click on the picture below to complete a short form about the free lunches. Thank You.
